seed_sequence.description: The full sequence of the protein of interest. This is the sequence that gets modified.

esm_model_files.description: S3 directory storing ESM pLM model files.

onehotcnn_model_files.description: S3 directory storing Onehot CNN predictor model files.

output_type.description: Output type, can be 'best', 'last', or 'all' variants

parallel_chains.description: Number of MCMC chains to run in parallel

n_steps.description: Number of MCMC steps per chain

max_mutations.description: Maximum number of mutations per variant
